id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOjQzNTU4Y2EwNjc.value: Louis Dreyfus Company International Holding B.V.

LDC and its subsidiaries (the “Group”) is a global merchant and processor of agricultural goods, operating a significant network of assets around the world. The Group’s activities span the entire value chain from farm to fork, across a broad range of business lines (platforms).
